comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a Wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_William_Beatty [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162905939/] Here is his 1915 passport application: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/3888113294/] Here is his 1942 WWII draft registration: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/3887675603] And I started one for Welsh: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_L._Welsh

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
undeadsinatra and Richard Arthur Norton: 

Thanks for the detailed background information on these two early aviators. We will add more detail to the record when we update.

comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Al L. Welsh   Instructor / Test / Demonstration Pilot for Wright Brothers   Aero Club of America Pilot# 23    killed College Park, Maryland  June 11,1912
George W. Beatty   Aero Club of America Pilot# 41  August 4, 1911
Beatty obtained training from Welsh at the Wright School , Nassau Boulevard Aerodrome , Garden City, Long Island, New York 1911
